import os
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

df = pd.read_csv('../input/los-angeles-metro-bike-share-trip-data/Metro Bike Share.csv')
source.0fb5e637:
# Aggregate the number of trips per day and plot result
trips_per_day = df.groupby('start_date').count()['trip_id']

plt.figure(figsize = (15, 4))
plt.plot(trips_per_day);
source.e6a0f03d:
The large, out of trend spikes come from CicLAvia events, where roads in a los angeles community are closed off to drivers and patrons are encouraged to ride bicycles in the area. The largest spikes coincide from their annual road closure event in Downtown Los Angeles.

https://www.ciclavia.org/events_history
